siteId.description: The id of the Netlify site you want to deploy to

deployDir.description: The path to the folder within the project that contains the build output to be deployed e.g. public

functionsDir.description: The path to the folder within the project that contains built Lambda functions to deploy e.g. functions

alias.description: Specifies the alias for deployment, the string at the beginning of the deploy subdomain.

auth.description: Netlify auth token to deploy with

message.description: A short message to include in the deploy log

prodIfUnlocked.description: Deploy to production if unlocked, create a draft otherwise

skipFunctionsCache.description: Ignore any functions created as part of a previous build or deploy commands, forcing them to be bundled again as part of the deployment

timeout.description: Timeout to wait for deployment to finish

httpProxy.description: Proxy server address to route requests through.

httpProxyCertificateFilename.description: Certificate file to use when connecting using a proxy server
